name: 饱和火力
author: RA2
description:
With overwhelming firepower, balance the world's mods
Mod QQ group 1：181108928.
or go to Github download the lastest version mod.
And i will live in bilibili
the server of Saturation firepower is opened,please load the newest mod to join the server.
———————————————
This mod very fit to be a mod template，You can find shadow of this mod in many new mods
When the mod's texture update，i will upload the old texture into QQ group for free，and take things what you need
[green[]]The info following green line must be read！！
———————————————[white[]]
The mod's Code is open source,and you can be copied it，but[red[]]Any Copy/color change/stitching[white[]]textures actions are belong to [red[]]Infringement of the author's intellectual property rights.
The mod's code and textures can be a[gold[]]start tools [white[]]for you，but can't be [gold[]]the Main force in your mod
[sky[]]Innovation is your first productivity！！！
Off the vicious cycle as soon as possible，and own your unique way in mod development！！！
Plagiarism will eventually be punished by players！！！
[green[]]———————————————[white[]]
The mod must update once every 2 months，and seldom have a urgent update(for some important problems)
The first thing when you join the QQ group is checking your mod version！
if you find a bug or have some problem,you can ask in QQ group,we will try our best to solve you problem. 
[green[]]———————————————[white[]]
The Mod updates history will record elsewhere
Here just record all update things in this varsion（X.X.X）
[green[]]———————————————[white[]]
Warning：Before you start play the mod high difficulty Battle,please [red[]]backup you archives！
[white[]]We are not responsible for any results of player wrong actions！
tip:if you feel you can't victory a battle,you can try it in custom first.
[yellow[]]Hope you have a good play time.
[green[]]———————————————[orange[]]

战役持续更新
